website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy outdoor picnic table set that comes with 2 benches you can move and use to best suit your needs.
pros: Dark top on the table hides wear and tear from outdoor use
Smooth edges on the corners of the tabletop
Includes snap-in-place holders for the table legs when transporting
Includes a handle for carrying the table
cons: The benches can be a little unsteady on uneven surfaces

customer_reviews.title: and it was great. Even my husband (who doesn't build picnic tables ...
customer_reviews.text: I kept waiting for my husband to build me a picnic table and benches. I got tired of waiting and ordered this item. I used it for the first time today, and it was great. Even my husband (who doesn't build picnic tables for me) likes it. Maybe I'll let him take it hunting with him in the fall, or maybe I won't.
customer_reviews.author: judyannemt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gatherings 😁
customer_reviews.text: We have used this so much since purchasing! We have 23 just in the immediate family. It folds up so compact. We just pull it out when the family comes over and it provides so much more seating than the traditional card table and separate chairs! We can get so many kids on here! As you can see in the pic - we just pop it in the living room and everyone is together. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: A Helms

customer_reviews.title: Even better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: This is better than I even expected! We are a large family of 8 and very quickly outgrew our kitchen table. I was drawn to this product by other reviews and for the ease of use, portability, and easy cleaning. The assembly literally took seconds and it is surprisingly very sturdy! We use this table for everything! We eat our meals there, do our homeschooling lessons there, arts and crafts, picnics...very versatile! I would definitely recommend this product for anyone considering purchasing. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: R.Kennedy34

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our July 4th Party
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this given the cheap price. Very pleasantly surprised. The package arrived in a compact box and in perfect condition. The table is in one piece and folded in half. Has a handle for easy carry. The table is heavy but easy to open and setups. It’s sturdy and no problem holding all the food and drinks. The benches easily seats 3-4 on each side. The only caveat is the bench is narrow, so make sure it’s set up on flat surface or it might tip over. Perfect for our July 4th party and easy to fold up and store.
customer_reviews.author: CiCi

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS TABLE AND BENCHES
customer_reviews.text: Yes, not just like, I love it. It is so easy to open and fold up and put away. It has a carry handle if you want to take it places. It fits our whole family easily. It is sturdy as hell. I need that. My kids clobber stuff. This takes a beating. The benches aren't too weird and narrow like some others we saw. these are sturdy and strong, which I was hoping for. Would definitely buy again. Definitely not wimpy or weak.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin & Coryn

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Paid $114 for it 23 months ago. We've been mostly happy with it. Used it in our dining room every day with preschool to school age children for meals, projects and homework. Today the welded fold of one of the benches came apart. It's too thin to try to weld back together. The benches are a little harder to clean than the table as the surfaces are more grooved. Some bits of glue stick, crayon, etc. just won't come out even with soaking and a brush. I feel like we got our money's worth though. We haven't been easy on this little table set.
customer_reviews.author: H. Family

customer_reviews.title: Defective bench
customer_reviews.text: One of the benches was defective. The middle leg was not straight. I tried to contact Amazon for assistance in finding the manufacturer for a replacement but the response was to “google office star”. Awesome customer service ! If it is not obvious, I am being sarcastic. A trillion dollar company not having the contact info of its suppliers and sellers in it’s database??? So I finally found the supplier‘s website and sent an email but it’s been 2 weeks with no reply. Hoping someone from office star can see this and send a replacement bench.
customer_reviews.author: MARIO SOLANO

customer_reviews.title: Very Solid and Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: We are very impressed with the quality of this table. It is very sturdy and seems like it should hold up well to lots of use. We bought it for a camping trip where it got 4 days of constant use by 8 people and it was perfect for our needs. It will also work well as an extra inside / outside table for home gatherings. Very pleased with this purchase. It was delivered before expected as well!
customer_reviews.author: B.A/M.A.

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good table but benches do not lock in open position
customer_reviews.text: The table and benches fold up compactly making them easy to transport. The table and benches are sturdy and well made. However the benches don’t lock in the open position. We use these for camping where ground is uneven and they have a tendency to fold up, so we use a six foot length of pipe threaded through the holes in the legs of each bench secured with a cotter pin at both ends to keep them open. Also the lock on the table Is not tight enough to keep the table completely flat on uneven ground.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: Product is well made and looks great. However I originally thought the table and benches were connected all in one piece. Turned out that the benches fold separately and tbh their legs are just not wide enough. The stability isn’t there especially if young children or toddler are trying to sit on it. Unless I’m already sitting on it the benches wobble as my toddler tries climbing on. Ultimately they should have made it to where the benches connected to the table for better stability or widened the leg supports to assist with that issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: This was a fantastic find!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased (5) of the tables with benches (Office Star Resin 3-Piece Folding Bench and Table) for an upcoming outdoor party. I was a little worried, but they arrived today and was pleasantly surprised! They are bigger than we expected (we read the dsize on line), but the independent benches makes it feel more spacious than a standard picnic table. They will easily fit 6 adults and they are really sturdy, with the center bench support there is no movement at all. The fact that these fold up and can be stored out of site is a major plus. I'd highly recommend these!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: I needed a table to seat 6 that could easily be set up and later stowed away to entertain outside on the deck. This set fits the bill and is very well constructed. It feels sturdy and secure and is easy to set up and take down. The folding benches take up little space compared to folding chairs. It arrived very well packed.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Very easy and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This table and bench chair set is so awesome. We actually use it as our daily dining room table in our apartment. If we dont have guests over we just fold one of the benches and store it under our bed. Then we push the table up against the wall and use just one bench. It saves us space. When we have guests over we move the table into the living room area and we can add chairs to the ends of it for more seats. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: a.e.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but needs tiny tweaks
customer_reviews.text: I like the set tho I wish the benches would lock. We use this for business and don’t want anyone falling. If they are moved they arch in the middle instead of staying flat. Also idk why but the table won’t stay locked when closed, upon moving to and from our storage. That’s a little frustrating. Over all it’s a good set. Sturdy for sure. They just need to work on the locking mechanisms. I’d still recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and store.
customer_reviews.text: We fought this set as an alternative to a table and several folding chairs and I’m very happy I did. It folds down easily and storing it under spare beds is much easier than individual chairs. You do have to sacrifice a little comfort over separate chairs using benches, but with lots of kids around, this has been a really great product for us.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Solid table. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Border Collie approved. Came in just in time to carve some pumpkins. Table kicks butt. Sturdy. Easy to fold. Easy to transport. If you’re a dude a need a solid, reliable table, this is the one. No BS, not fancy, just built well, and easy to transport.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: We love it.
customer_reviews.text: It's really heavy, but we wanted it to use as a picnic table outside, so the heaviness is good and keeps it in place. Very sturdy. Folds up easy to store. We used it for a recent cookout and it was awesome. And I don't have to mow around it, so bonus!
customer_reviews.author: JQJ

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to give this a 4
customer_reviews.text: But my wife said I couldn't. You see it's a great set, especially for the price. However, while using it, both her mother and father fell off the side as one of the bench legs folded in. I would chalk that up to clumsiness but the locking ring does have the tendency to slide. That being said the rings could easily be made more taught with a mallet. (but it seems more fun this way)
customer_reviews.author: JDCalVino

customer_reviews.title: Being able to move it anywhere at my mountain home.
customer_reviews.text: This is so perfect for my Airbnb mountain because it is easy to store away until the next guests. It is light-weight so it can be placed around for different views. It is surdy.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Table and benches
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a big dent on the top of the table. The locking thing underneeth to lock the legs of the table in place is warped and difficult to move into place. It is a very sturdy nice table and bench set despite that. I like that I can store it under the couch. I need it now, so won't be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: More than expected !
customer_reviews.text: I was really shocked that the construction of this table and bench is so heavy duty, perfect for extra seating for my family for Dinners,now I can just unfold and enjoy......No one without a seat!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable!
customer_reviews.text: Top quality, sturdy, and just what I needed for large family get-togethers! Well worth the investment! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: John-Michael

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy. Nice that both table and benches fold but doesn’t latch when opened so difficult to move around. Can’t really use well on concrete. For the amount of money I was hoping for better quality. Also, it came broken with one of the pieces that holds the legs to the table was not working.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Christmas gathering. Like enough it stays on my back porch now. I use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: BEN

customer_reviews.title: Crab Feast Table and Benches
customer_reviews.text: Purchased several of these sets for my summer home. Perfect for hosting summer crab feasts. Seats 4 adults comfortably (crab eating requires elbow room) or six kids. Easy clean, easy set-up, take down, and store.
customer_reviews.author: ellen

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Great investment. Its exactly as described. I would definitely buy again. Very sturdy, great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: A must for family gatherings.
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for us At Thanksgiving. Instead of renting chairs and tables. The family absolutely loved it. Would recommend to everyone and it folds so it’s easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Zuly copeland

customer_reviews.title: Legs collapes easily
customer_reviews.text: The legs easily collapses and my sons both hurt themselves. Maybe better outside or on gravel/concrete. I do not recommend on tile floors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This has been a great fold up table
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great fold up table. We have taken it every where and used it for all kinds of parties. Love it. A big plus is that you can spray it off if you are having outside functions. Very sturdy and not flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Elanea Golmaryami

customer_reviews.title: Great for everything
customer_reviews.text: I really like how light this set is. Gotta my family of 5 easily with an extra space.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Loved the fact it was easy to set up and after using was easy to return to the box until needed next time.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, nice looking, compact when folded down.  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised when I received the table and benches. They are quite heavy and sturdy, fold in half and have a handle to carry each item, plus don't take up much room when folded. I needed something for more seating for family for birthdays and holidays. A card table was not enough, so I decided to purchase this 3-piece set. I am so happy I did! Great set, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A. Scaricamazza

customer_reviews.title: Space saver!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product I wishe they sold just the benches!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this set! Easy to set up and break down, would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product with a warning
customer_reviews.text: Hosted several parties at our pool yard. Enjoyed the set thoroughly. Warning: Be aware of tipping issue due to the benches' narrow profile... it's physics after all. Used more steady chairs instead of the benches if you have obese elderly or edgy children.
customer_reviews.author: Provider

customer_reviews.title: Backyard picnic table
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a picnic table for eating outside with the family. There were 6 of us for a shrimp boil with plenty of seating and table top room. Feels sturdy and easy to fold and store when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Diane S

customer_reviews.title: Great table!
customer_reviews.text: It is actually a light gray, not white as expected but I'm okay with that. It's very easy to set up and take down. It's light enough that I can lift and move it around myself. It feels very sturdy and durable when sitting though. There is a minor slope in the table when open that I am hoping goes away after more uses. Otherwise I'm very pleased with this table & bench set!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Chef

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to have an overflow table for holiday dinners. It fulfillled it's duty perfectly. Sturdy and portability is great.
customer_reviews.author: L H

customer_reviews.title: What we needed, but be aware of bench latches!
customer_reviews.text: couldn't find anything like this here in Hawaii - was so glad that I found it here at a great price with a fantastic deal on shipping (we usually pay ourselves to death out here on shipping). After using for an extended period of time I have to say - Be careful, the legs of the benches some times seem to be latched, but they aren't and they have collapsed/folded when someone sat down. Double check before sitting!
customer_reviews.author: Justleesa

customer_reviews.title: Easy Durable Folding Table and Benches
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the type of folding table I was looking for. So easy to assemble and I was able to fit 8 people around it for my dinner party. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great table and benches
customer_reviews.text: Really great for camping- easy to haul in and out of trailer.
customer_reviews.author: T-View

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: It's very sturdy. I like unfolding 2 benches and not having to deal with folding chairs. It slides easily on my hardwood floors but this could be stopped by adding a non-skid pad to the legs.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: Arrived intact
customer_reviews.text: Just unpacked it and opened the table and two benches. Very positive first impression. It fulfills all my expectations! UPS did well.
customer_reviews.author: BillyBoy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well built
customer_reviews.text: Quick and efficient delivery. Sturdy and well built. We take it with our camper so that no matter where we go we know we will always have a picnic bench to enjoy eating outside.
customer_reviews.author: Umafufu

customer_reviews.title: Bought for camping! Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Strong and light weight! Good for a family of 6! Or 12 kids. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Austin G.

customer_reviews.title: More usable when benches not connected
customer_reviews.text: Tables are just what we needed at the day care. Benches double as tables for the littlest ones and bigger ones can stand and paint or work on projects.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Purchased for use at a 3 year old birthday party. Stood up to the challenge. We look forward to many more parties for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A. Sparta

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am not mechanically inclined but this table and benches seemed to put themselves together it was so easy. They are very comfortable. Shortly after I put them together, it rained. The set dried nicely with no problems. I used them for an outdoor party. Although eight people could fit, I think it is more comfortable and roomy for six.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Description wrong
customer_reviews.text: Not as described, tall adult size, benches too. Grand kids couldn’t use. Ages 8 up maybe.
customer_reviews.author: Lori K

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to open and close, transport
customer_reviews.text: I'm really pleased with this purchase and consider it a worthwhile investment. We have already used it 3 times in the last month, and it's so easy to fold up and store that I will bring it out even if it's not necessary. I also made some cushions for the benches because they aren't the most comfortable seats in the world, but what can you expect from plastic really. Love having benches instead of chairs, they fit more people and take less effort and space to store. Totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: K. Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Big and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This table is big and sturdy and folds up neatly. It would be nice if it had handle holds, but it's not enough for me to take a star away, becuase it really is a nice table. The bench seats are separate which is really nice to be able to position them where they need to be based on who's using them, and it gives the option to just use the benches without the table. Extra seating when you need it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Jean

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my daughter's birthday party and everyone kept asking me where I got it. It seated an amazing number of 5 year olds and made our small house much more spacious for this at home party. High quality that I imagine I will use for years. I already have requests from numerous friends who want to borrow in the coming months.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores M. LeBec

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: It is great to travel with and easy set up and clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter

customer_reviews.title: Handy and sturdy set.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality set with ease of storage. Used it for 8-10 adults and everybody was comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: David Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for us
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to be able to take it out by the pool in the summers and use during the holidays. It was easy to use and being able to fold everything makes storing it a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Kdskandles

customer_reviews.title: Functional!
customer_reviews.text: Love this table! This is going to be perfect for my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Richards

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and sturdy. You have to make sure that the legs ...
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and sturdy. You have to make sure that the legs lock to avoid any accidents. Great for outdoor or indoor parties.
customer_reviews.author: Tyagi

customer_reviews.title: Strong enough to seat BIG MEN...  Light enough for a girl to set up!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the folding table and benches for an "emergency" family gathering at my house. I was completely delighted with the quality and the ease of set up. We fit 8 people EASILY at the table. The set feels very durable - but it's not bulky (takes up little space when folded). I was so happy - I immediately purchased a second set. If you're considering this set - I'd highly recommend it, without hesitation!
customer_reviews.author: EEB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fold and stows perfectly in our RV. Study set for 2 adults and two older boys for dining when camping. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopping Rocks

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived well packaged and looking exactly like it was advertised. We purchased it for Thanksgiving so we haven't used it yet but it was super easy to unfold. Seems sturdy and I'm sure we'll end up using it more than once a year. Easily fits 3 average sized adults on each side.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Porschen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: Great price and super sturdy. I've tried other brands and they don't match up to the quality and sturdiness of Office Star brand. Foldable makes sooo convenient for large parties and easy tuck away when the party is over..
customer_reviews.author: Bunny331

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Used these for thanksgiving in a small place! Perfect size and fit over 20 people in our townhouse!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Hill

customer_reviews.title: Easy to store
customer_reviews.text: Great for indoors to seat extra people for the holidays or a party
customer_reviews.author: April Irving

customer_reviews.title: Handy family table
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use for a family reunion. Reasonable price, easy to move, sturdy and stable, seated many comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schum

customer_reviews.title: It's really easy to set up and to transport when necessary
customer_reviews.text: It's really easy to set up and to transport when necessary. Saves a lot of space. I like that I can store it when not in use and take it out only when needed. Sets up in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Its a Great table it is very good quality. I like it its very sturdy and it easy to fold up. I'll definitely buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon atondo

customer_reviews.title: These are AMAZING! Perfect for extra tables to have on hand ...
customer_reviews.text: These are AMAZING! Perfect for extra tables to have on hand for family gatherings and birthday parties. They fold down to store really small as well.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: CAMPING
customer_reviews.text: I DO ALOT OF CAMPING AND THE PICNIC TABLES ARE ALWAYS BROKEN OR NON EXSITENT THE TABLE AND BEACHS ARE LIGHT WEIGHT AND FOLD FLAT I AM A BIG DUDE AND IT HOLD THE WEIGHT JUST FINE COULD NOT BEAT THE PRICE
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: wonderfully durable and strong table and benches
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about this set because it folded up, thought it might be flimsy. But it's not. It's super heavy duty and looks good - I should be able to use it for many years, either in the back yard or while camping with our popup. It fits just fine in the camper for hauling.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice
customer_reviews.text: We got lots of compliments on this table and bench. All folds up nicely for easy storage. Both were sturdy for all family members. Wish was less expensive as I would like to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: It works, it's easy to set up. An 11 year old girl can set this up by herself.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Frye

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I love these. easy to transport, not to heavy. Perfect for extra seating and really sturdy
customer_reviews.author: sdrkgideon

customer_reviews.title: STURDY STURDY STURDY IS ALL I CAN SAY!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best table and bench set I have ever seen. I ordered 2 of these for our holiday celebrations, used it on Thanksgiving and it worked perfectly for our LARGE gathering. Will be using it for Christmas and our New Years Eve hog roast too! One of the tables sat 6 adults comfortably and the other one we used for the "kids" table which sat 8 kids. Very good quality, should last for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy set up! easy to clean and store. Quick delivery for a last minute weekend bbq plan.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: We're surprised on how sturdy and its a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Cristine Muckenfuhs

customer_reviews.title: We bought three of these and we love the fact that they are so much easier to ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat these table and benches for the money! We bought three of these and we love the fact that they are so much easier to set up and store than our other picnic tables.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap plastic, it was not at all the durability that I was expecting. The table bows in the middle. Such a rip off for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ferchrad

customer_reviews.title: ONE OF MY BEST PURCHASES!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. Even the hubby agrees it was one of our best investments. Easy to set up and break down. I usually set up one inside the house and outside on the patio for big parties. LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kittie

customer_reviews.title: 3-piece folding bench and table
customer_reviews.text: Used this table during my annual family reunion, worked like a champ! I like being able to put it away, out of the bad weather.
customer_reviews.author: Margery E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and low cost for my needs including Thanksgiving dinner in Florida by the pool. Have you checked the price of traditional picnic tabes? If so, this option is the answer.
customer_reviews.author: ABBA

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic buy
customer_reviews.text: This was a wonderful purchase. I really needed exactly this product for my bbq's with family. It is so easy to set up that my 4 year old Grand-daughter helps. Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: hael40

customer_reviews.title: Perfect duel solution
customer_reviews.text: This table and benches worked so well as a dining table for eight at Thanksgiving and then as a picnic table a week later. So easy to set up and the to store for future use.
customer_reviews.author: jaguerrero

customer_reviews.title: ... table a couple years ago and so far so good. Easy to put it up and take it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table a couple years ago and so far so good. Easy to put it up and take it down. Easy to clean. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy access
customer_reviews.text: Its very useful for getting together easy to put and get out
customer_reviews.author: Eric A.

customer_reviews.title: but otherwise a great table and bench set
customer_reviews.text: benches are hard to move without them folding up on you, but otherwise a great table and bench set! I like that you can move the benches in and out, instead of having them attached at a fixed distance--I'm using these for teaching so this works for different sized kids!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Piscioneri

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: I love this table! Sturdy, thoughtful design. Should give years of service....I don't like imported products but I took a chance and found this table is quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dmac

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Benches not as sturdy as i would have liked. Bigger people.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect investment
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our Memorial Day party. Great seating for the kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: KC Lyons

customer_reviews.title: When you absolutely need the extra seating ..
customer_reviews.text: .. this is the way to go, and this product met expectations. Easy to set up - sturdy, sturdy, sturdy - and just as easy to store away.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: This table is awesome for camping and fits in our 5th wheel
customer_reviews.text: This table is awesome for camping and fits in our 5th wheel. It also' makes a great backup table. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly bench
customer_reviews.text: One of the benches is wobbly due to one of the legs being shorter than the rest.

customer_reviews.title: Great

customer_reviews.title: Great portability
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my back yard as needed. I love the fact that it is easy to fold and has a carry handle inside. I suspect it should last a long time. I will give it a good field test and get back with you later on down the line. I do not baby anything i own so it will be interesting to see if this is built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy Hill

customer_reviews.text: This is so great. Comes with a bag to store table and bences, it is sturdy and conveniant. We bought one for our RV, then ended up loving it so much we bought one for our cabin.

product_meta.title: Office Star Resin 3-Piece Folding Bench and Table Set, 2 Benches and 6 x 2.5-Feet Table
product_meta.description:
3 Piece Folding Table and Bench Set

AMAZON.COM
An economical, user-friendly choice for offices, classrooms, and events, Office Star's resin furniture offers lightweight yet durable solutions to workspace, dining, and seating needs. This three-piece folding table and bench set features two backless benches with heavy-duty white seats made of waterproof, stainproof, scratch-, and impact-resistant blow-mold resin and a 6-foot resin table with a matching resin top. Dark gray powder-coated steel tube frames offer low-profile stability, and rubber end caps protect floors from damage. For space-saving storage, all three pieces fold in half and the legs tuck inside to create flat, stackable surfaces. The table measures 72 inches long by 30 inches wide by 29-1/2 inches high and the benches each measure 72-1/2 inches long by 12 inches wide by 17-1/2 inches high. Table: 350 pounds evenly distributed/Chair: 200 pounds. Designed for indoor and outdoor use; easy clean-up. --Kara Karll
feature_bullets: Heavy-duty blow-mold light grey resin top and seat for durability and easy cleanup
Waterproof, stain, scratch, and impact resistant
Ideal for indoor or outdoor use; Max Weight Capacity: Table: 350 pounds evenly distributed; Chair: 200 pounds
Table dimensions: 72 inches long , 30 inches wide, and 29-1/2 inches high. Assembly required: No
Bench dimensions: 72-1/2 inches long, 12 inches wide, and 17-1/2 inches high
